mapper.select: select * from food order by code
mapper.insert: insert into food(code, name, maker, material, image, supportpereat, calory, carbo, protein, fat, sugar, natrium, chole, fattyacid, transfat) values (#{code}, #{name}, #{maker}, #{material}, #{image}, #{supportpereat}, #{calory}, #{carbo}, #{protein}, #{fat}, #{sugar}, #{natrium}, #{chole}, #{fattyacid}, #{transfat})
mapper.select: select code, name, maker, material, image from food where maker like CONCAT('%',#{maker},'%')
select code, name, maker, material, image from food where name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
select code, name, maker, material, image from food where name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
select f.* from food f join pick p using(code) where id = #{id}
